sentence: And Herschel Walker is not walking through that door, fans.
author: Steve Hummer
title: Champion 1980 Bulldogs have waited long enough for company

sentence: The Bulldogs hadn't won a national title since freshman Herschel Walker led them there in 1980.
title: Georgia Bulldogs win first national title since 1980

sentence: Oh, and a tailback named Herschel Walker.
author: Chip Towers
title: Belief makes Georgia Bulldogs a threat to win it all again
